questions: Is there a group of people in the image?
Is there a tall tree in the image?
Are the people hidden by the tall tree?
model_output:
yes, there is a group of people in the image; they are facing towards the light source.
yes, there is a tall tree in the image; it is part of the background and frames the scene.
yes, the people are wearing hats; all the individuals in the group have hats on.
no, the people are not hidden by the tall tree; they are visible and in the foreground under the tree.
